meanings.definition: A person or thing that itemises.
meanings.sent1: The itemisers at the store carefully listed all the products on sale.
meanings.sent2: The itemisers in the office organized the inventory efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The itemisers at the party made sure everyone got their fair share of snacks.
meanings.sent4: She was like an itemiser of memories, cataloging every moment in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The itemisers in the library meticulously arranged the books by genre.

meanings.definition: To list or detail individual items.
meanings.sent1: Please itemisers the expenses for the project report.
meanings.sent2: I need to itemisers all the tasks for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: He decided to itemisers his collection of stamps for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind began to itemisers all the reasons why she loved him.
meanings.sent5: The chef would itemisers the ingredients before starting to cook.
